title: Trump Launches Third 'Mugshot' NFT Collection Generating $9.9 Million Revenue
summary: Trump launched his third NFT collection titled 'MugShot' featuring 100,000 digital trading cards based on his Georgia election interference mugshot, priced at $99 each. The collection generated approximately $9.9 million in initial revenue and offered pieces of Trump's actual mugshot suit to buyers purchasing 47 cards. The launch caused his previous NFT collection prices to drop nearly 50% initially, demonstrating potential market cannibalization and the volatile nature of Trump's digital asset strategy.

sources.title: Trump sells mugshot suit, Mar-a-Lago dinner in latest NFT promotion
Donald Trump just sabotaged his old NFT collections with his new NFT collection
Donald Trump Unveils New 'Mugshot' NFTs, Stirring Up Prices for His Previous NFTs
